reqs:
Equivalents: ASIA 320
In 2017W, HIST 378, section 101 is cross-listed with ASIA 320, section 001. All students should register in ASIA 320, 001.
In 2017W, HIST 378, section 002 is cross listed with ASIA 320, section 002. All students should register in ASIA 320, 002.
description: History of China from the earliest times to the disintegration of the Tang Empire. Students will acquire the analytical skills and tools to understand the origins and foundations of Chinese society.
